channel.title: 317 - making music fade - rep++

item.title: 317 - making music fade - rep++
item.dc:creator: @gara494 gara494
item.description:
@gara494 wrote:

I dont know if this is server sided or client sided, but this is my signlink in my deltascape client

My music method:

[code]if(midiplay)
{

                                  midi = s + savereq;
				
                            try {
                                System.out.println("Play MIDI " + midi);
                               if (musicSr != null) {
                                    musicSr.stop();
                                   musicSr.close();
				System.out.println("music change or stop1");
                                }


                               musicSr = null;
                                musicS = null;
                                
                                File music = new File(midi);
                                if(music.exists())
                                {
                                    musicS = MidiSystem.getSequence(music);
				

                                }

                                // Create a sequencer for the sequence
				musicSr = MidiSystem.getSequencer();
                                musicSr.open();
		
                                musicSr.setSequence(musicS);
                                musicSr.start();
                              } catch (InvalidMidiDataException ex1) {
				System.out.println("force stop by midi");
                            } catch (Exception ex) {
                                ex.printStackTrace();
                            }
                
                
                midiplay = false;[/code]

please let me know if theres a packet that might be able to handle it and its use
